itunes:title: MAR 24 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 29 UPDATE
title: MAR 24 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 29 UPDATE
description:
Questions from leading Republican senators about Supreme Court nominee Ketanji Brown Jackson’s sentencing of child-pornography offenders marked a charged moment during her confirmation hearing. The Russian invasion in Ukraine marks one month, just as Russia’s Foreign Minister, Sergey Lavrov meets with Moscow-accredited ambassadors from the BRICS nations to discuss global relations. Meanwhile, Ukraine blocks trans women refugees claiming, “They are men, must go back and fight.” Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO

To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO
